title: Search the Cellar
content:
(X-539, Y:-364), you'll find some vines going down. Be careful reaching these vines as there's a Phase Spider Matriarch nearby. Either defeat her and the rest of the spiders in the cave to get through, or stealth your way down the vines. Head northwest to (X:-557, Y:-357) to find a Dark Amethyst on the ground.
